title: I'm not getting cse in pes :(
content: So I got 23xx rank in pessat and I was pretty convinced I'll get cse in ec campus according to last year's cutoffs. My friend's brother got cse in ec campus and he got a rank around 27xx so I was so happy and excited that I finally managed to get a good college after my kcet and mains were messed up. My parents through some contacts talked to some head of department at ec campus and asked him what branch I would get for my rank. He said cse is not possible. Apparently they reduced the seats through pessat to make room for more management seats or some shit? Idk... Why's there such a big change in cutoffsðŸ˜­

comments.body:
bruh i dont think so the seat matrix is still the same atleast for cse it hasnt changed in ec campus

[https://pes.edu/intake-of-courses/](https://pes.edu/intake-of-courses/) see here
I think he was trying to sell you a seat

You, my friend, have unreliable contacts.   
Better come for counselling and then see :)
uhmm i dont think that's true dont take the risk of not coming for counseling
Don't really have an idea but I'll update tomorrow what happens at counseling:D
Haha you're probably right but I'll make sure to update the post once my counseling is done tomorrow:D
